title: CSS Bookshelf

descriptionfull: A bookshelf I made using purely CSS. Also has some fun animations :).

title: PayApi
description: A 4-page responsive demo marketing site. Complete with custom form validation.
descriptionfull: This Site was built as a frontendmentor challange. The site is a 4-page responsive demo marketing site with a homepage, about page, pricing page and contact page. Complete with custom form validation.

title: ThreeJS App
description: A small ThreeJS app with user adjustable lighting. Models were made in Blender.
descriptionfull: A small ThreeJS app where the user can adjust the lighting. Models were made in Blender.

title: The Planets
description: A website showing facts about the planets. Built using Vue, Typescript and Sass.
descriptionfull: This Site was built as a frontendmentor challange. The project is a fully responsive 8-page fact site for all planets in our solar system. I went with a Typescript approach building the site using one html template and changing the data dynamically. Complete with animations

title: NanoTip
description: A loginless app that allows streamers to enable Twitch or Youtube donations with nano. Uses the nano API.
descriptionfull: A little bit of an older project i built. A loginless app that allows streamers to enable Twitch or Youtube donations with nano (crypto). Streamers can set up custom Nano donations pages. Viewers can then send streamers Nano donations using QR-codes generated by the site. Using public nano nodes and the nano api the site then checks weather the transaction went went through and then alerts the streamer when it does. The app uses Firebase to store a donation history for each Streamer. Comes with a recent donation widget and obs browsersource for the streamer.
